title: I WAS WRONG ABOUT THE iPHONE XS CHARGER CASE!!
description: PLEASE SUBSCRIBE:  GET MY PINK iJUSTINE CABLES HERE:   GET MY EDITING PLUGIN:    MUSIC I USE -   FRIEND ME HERE:        MY NEW PROJECT:   PODCAST:       WHAT I USE TO MAKE VIDEOS    CAMERAS: Sony a7 IV -  Sony a1 -   Sony a7s III -   Insta 360 ONE X3 -  Insta 360 ONE RS -  Insta 360 GO2 -   LENSES: New Sony GM 24-70mm ii -  Older Sony GM 24-70mm -  New Sony Sony 20-70mm -  Sony GM 16-35mm -  Sony GM 50mm -  Sony GM 135mm -  Sony GM 85mm -   AUDIO:  Sennheiser AVX Digital Wireless -  Sony XLR Adapter -  Sony Hot Shoe Shotgun -  Tiny Sony Microphone -  DJI Mics -  Rode Podcaster Pro II -  Podcaster Mic -  Elgato Wave 3 Mic -   DRONES: DJI Mavic 3 -  DJI Mini 3 -  DJI Air 2S -   LIGHTING: Aputure 600d Pro -  Aputure Light Dome II -  Aputure Amaran 200d -  Aputure 35in Light Dome -  Aputure Lantern Softbox -   Sony CF Express A 160g + Card Reader-  Sony CF Express A 800g -     These links are affiliate and by using them youre helping out my channel! Thank you!     BECOME A CHANNEL MEMBER:
transcript: - I was wrong about the iPhone XS battery case. I was wrong in saying that it was only 1369mA. But the thing that I was most wrong about was the fact that I said that I didn't need this. I do need it. Before we get into why I love this thing so much. A huge thank you to LastPass for sponsoring this video. You guys have been so incredible and I've been using LastPass for quite a while now. What I love about LastPass is not only do they keep all of my passwords safe and secure, but they can also create very unique passwords for every one of my accounts. LastPass will save all of your user names and passwords so anytime you need to log in if it's on your phone, if it's on your computer it makes it super super simple. It works on iOS, Android, MacOS, Windows, basically anything that you need to log into. It'll remember all those things and log you in instantly. So you don't have to remember all of your passwords, or write them down, or lose them. Everything will be safe and secure. They also have this other cool thing. It'll give you password breach alerts. It'll let you know if that password that your using is not secure any longer. So huge thank you to LastPass for sponsoring this video. Again, I'll put a link in the description to LastPass if you guys want to check it out. And now, let's talk about this case. According to this Verge article, instead of using a single large cell like the iPhone 7 battery case, Apple is actually using two battery cells wired in a series which keeps the net amperage the same but lets it boost the voltage to 8.7V. Which is higher than the previous 3.8V. So like I was saying this case has been unbelievably just shockingly way better than I thought it was going to be. I was kind of skeptical when I first did the unboxing. I was like okay, it's just another case for my phone that charges the battery. So the best example that kind of really solidified how much I love this is the other day when I was traveling back to Los Angeles from Pennsylvania. I got up super early on the East Coast. I think it was like 5 AM there, packed, got to the airport, traveled, was on my phone all day long during the flight, get back home, do whatever it is that I have to do and by the time I went to bed like I still actually had battery left. And it was kind of shocking because before I would always feel like I was tethered to a battery device. Like I would always constantly have something with me. I was always charging my phone I felt like, and with this my phone was always charged. I didn't have to worry about anything. I was so impressed with this thing that I'm making a follow up video. I've said so many great things about this case that my sister was like "Well I need to get one too." So after this video I'm going to go surprise her with this. I also love that it kind of has this little ridge. I did say that it was heavy, but now I'm so used to it. I never drop my phone anymore because I'm able to just kind of hold on to it too. So it's been great when I'm filming or taking pictures. Sometimes when I'm using the Osmo Pocket, actually here's a video from when I was playing Topgolf not too long ago and it was raining. So not only did the case get wet, but my phone got wet and the Osmo Pocket. Oh man. I may have done a bad thing. Technically it's been charging sort of all day, but you know what I mean. It's just crazy to see that it is this late and my phone still has charge. It's shocking to me. I mean the iPhone XS Max already has really great battery life, I thought. So I thought this was something that I wouldn't need, and now it's something that I just can't even live without.
